title: “Tradiciones Dominicanas”
desc: This concert is a celebration of Dominican folkloric as well as popular music, featuring performances of dances spectacularly choreographed by the renowned Dominican scholar, educator, and performer Maestro Leonardo Iv?n Dom?nguez and Conjunto Folklorico, whose repertoire includes more than 50 dances of Afro-Dominican and colonial Spanish heritage, such as merengue, bachata, vals, and mangulina. The music will be performed by La Camerata Washington Heights.  Este concierto es una celebraci?n de la m?sica tradicional y folkl?rica de la Rep?blica Dominicana destacando las danzas coreografiadas espectacularmente por el reconocido estudioso, educador y int?rprete dominicano Maestro Leonardo Iv?n Dom?nguez y su Conjunto Folkl?rico, cuyo repertorio incluye m?s de 50 danzas de la herencia colonial espa?ola y afro-dominicana tales como el merengue, la bachata, el vals y la mangulina. La m?sica ser? interpretada por La Camerata Washington Heights .
